## Type of change
- [ ] Data pipeline (bronze / silver / gold databases)

## Checklist
- [ ] Code/notebooks run locally (or in CI where applicable)
- [ ] No secrets or credentials in commits
- [ ] README or doc updated if behavior/APIs changed
- [ ] SQL changes aligned with target database/schema (if applicable)
